artist: Artist: David Shrigley; Printer: Schaefer Grafiske Værksted, Copenhagen; Publisher: Galleri Nicolai Wallner, Copenhagen
description: Black and white line drawing of a large, bulbous hourglass within a box; about half the sands have fallen from the upper to the lower part of the glass.

signed: Signed with initials and dated in pencil, LR: DS 05
title: Untitled (Hourglass)
